prompts: Create a shape-shifting Pokemon that can transform into anything it sees.
Show me a playful Pokemon that loves to mimic other creatures and objects.
Generate a cute, blob-like Pokemon that has a friendly and approachable demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into any environment, changing its form and color.
Design a unique Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, often seen in parks.
Give me a Pokemon that can adapt to any battle style, showcasing versatility.
Make a lovable Pokemon that is always curious and inquisitive about its surroundings.
